testcase.classname: To validate the functionalties of Products
testcase.name: Validating Products Option
testcase.system-out: Given user clicks on the "Products" Option to validate......................passed When user select any product In Products Option.............................passed And user selects "Quantity" as <qty>........................................passed And user clicks on "Confirm" Option to Login................................passed And user should enter registered mobile number in Products Option...........passed And user adds "Pin" number as <pin> in Products Option......................passed And user clicks on "Login" option...........................................passed Then clicks on "Confirm" Option to check availability.......................passed
